definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: food, eating (with some verbal force, cf. Dr:JPh xi. 217) only P, & Ez ; always [[לְאָכְלָה]],
esp. in phr. like ´[[לָכֶם יִהְיֶה לְאָ]] Ge 1:29, Ge 6:21, Ge 9:3, Le 11:39; so Le 25:6 [[וְהָיְתָה שַׁבַּת הָאָרֶץ לָכֶם לְאָבְלָה]] cf. ´[[נׇתַן לְא]] Ge 1:30, Ex 16:15.
devouring, by wild beasts, only fig. of ravaged people Ez Eze 29:5, Eze 34:5, Eze 34:8, Eze 34:10, Eze 39:4, cf. Eze 35:12.
consumimg, in fire Ez Eze 15:4, Eze 15:6, of fire-sacrifice of children Eze 23:37; fig. of judgment of ´[[י]] Ez Eze 21:32; (cf. also inf. of [[אָכַל]]).
